input.desc: Enter your email address or phone number that you use for your account.

confirm.desc-phone-after: We have sent you a temporary password to.  Please enter it below to proceed with password recovery.

confirm.desc-email-after: If the email is not received within 10 minutes, please make sure the address you entered is correct.

success.title: Your password has been successfully changed
